long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly export stories from the page.
This extension will help you copy a nice formatted list of Work Items to clipboard so you can copy it to an email or Word document.

1. Open release details
2. Select deployment stage
3. Select "Work Items" tab
4. Open popup from the bottom right corner
